name: Spectrum Adventure
description:
This is a game we made for a national competition, It is a 2D Platformer where you jump you way through the color spectrum to return color to your world!  Thank You!

Game made by Nathan Poulin and Brianna Trask (briannathewolf599.deviantart.com)

For development streams follow S.A. Development on Twitch.

WE WON! Thank you to everyone who play tested the game, it really means a lot to us and without all the support and help, there is no way we would've been able to keep working on this!

Free assets are used in this build by the Unity Asset store.
